HEADLINE: Another 11 hostages freed, Israel says, as Gaza truce extended
SUMMARY: The latest hostage release comes as Israel and Hamas agree to extend the current truce just hours before it was due to expire.

SUMMARY: BBC Arabic and BBC Verify have pieced together how armed groups came together to train for the assault.

HEADLINE: UK PM Sunak cancels Greek PM meeting in Elgin Marbles row
SUMMARY: Kyriakos Mitsotakis, who wants the Parthenon Sculptures returned, is "disappointed" the meeting has been called off.

HEADLINE: Imran Khan's ex-adviser attacked with acid in UK
SUMMARY: Mirza Shahzad Akbar said the chemical missed his eyes but caused injuries on his body.

HEADLINE: Shock as New Zealand axes world-first smoking ban
SUMMARY: Health experts are appalled as the new government plans to repeal the policy to fund tax cuts.

HEADLINE: UAE planned to use climate talks to make oil deals
SUMMARY: Leaked documents show how the COP28 host planned to use its role to strike fossil fuel business deals.

HEADLINE: Suspect pleads not guilty after Vermont shooting
SUMMARY: Three men of Palestinian descent were wounded in an attack in Burlington on Saturday.

HEADLINE: US Navy seizes attackers who held Israel-linked tanker
SUMMARY: Houthi rebels fired missiles towards the warship which chased the armed men trying to escape by boat.

HEADLINE: Six French teenagers on trial over teacher's murder
SUMMARY: The suspects are accused of inciting the murder and pointing out the teacher to the killer.

HEADLINE: Ancient treasures back in Ukraine after court battle
SUMMARY: Golden helmets and precious gems are sent to Kyiv after a 10-year row with Russia over their ownership.

HEADLINE: Thai groom kills four at wedding, including bride
SUMMARY: Police say the shooter, who killed himself, was "quite intoxicated at the time".

HEADLINE: Lightning and hailstorms kill 24 in western India
SUMMARY: Heavy storms are unusual for Gujarat in winter, and the ferocious downpour caught many off guard.

SUMMARY: Locals have been warned not to touch the dead birds as the avian influenza virus can spread to humans.
